comprehensive_overview: Exiv2 is a C++ library and a command-line utility to manage image metadata. It provides fast and easy read and write access to the Exif, IPTC, and XMP metadata of images in various formats.
core_features:
1. Supports reading and writing Exif metadata in various image formats
2. Supports reading and writing IPTC and XMP metadata
3. Command-line utility for batch processing of image metadata
4. Embeds, extracts, and deletes metadata from images
5. Supports various image formats including JPEG, TIFF, PNG, and more
